title: James Bond to debut in book, comic book
text:
Updated: Jul 07, 2015 18:44 IST Warren Ellis' James Bond comics will be based on the original Ian Fleming novels.(Twitter/Jason Masters) 
If you are a James Bond fan and have read all Bond novels by Ian Fleming, here's an exciting news for you. The English spy will appear in a first-time-ever on-going comic series. 
The comic series will be written by acclaimed graphic novel author Warren Ellis of RED fame and the artwork will be handled by Jason Masters (Guardians of the Galaxy). The comics will be published by Dynamite. 
The comics will be based on the Bond as portrayed in Fleming's original novels and Ellis is excited about it. Warren Ellis is famous for his work RED (AFP Photo) 
"Ian Fleming's James Bond is an icon, and it's a delight to tell visual narratives with the original, brutal, damaged Bond of the books," he says in a statement. Trying really hard not to update my bio to 'James Bond artist'. — Jason Masters (@thejasonmasters) July 6, 2015 
The comics will be called James Bond 007 and the first story, ‘VAGAR' will follow Bond tracking down the killer of a fellow 00 agent. Tags
